text: Geleen is a city in the Dutch province of Limburg. In 2020, 31,670 people lived there. Since 2001, it is part of the new municipality of Sittard-Geleen. Category:21st-century disestablishments in the Netherlands Category:Cities in Limburg Category:Former municipalities of Limburg (Netherlands) Category:Sittard-Geleen
title: Geleen
